ygData.msgSnippet: What area are werewolves in? I ve seen one and heard of someone fighting one other in West Commons. Any other areas? Also, about what level are they? I ve
ygData.messageBody:
What area are werewolves in? I've seen one and heard of someone fighting one
other in West Commons. Any other areas? Also, about what level are they?
I've heard about 18-20th.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sandeep Shekar [mailto:sandeep@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 6:05 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] WnS


From: Sandeep Shekar <sandeep@...>

>Lupine Claw Gauntlets

Quest for Karg Icebear. Kill a werewolf, take werewolf claws (if they
popped) to Karg Icebear in Everfrost and pay him 75pp and he'll make them
for you.

>Thick Leather Apron

Undead barkeep in unrest.
